n0:createSxmlObject.n0:source: <VIEW xmlns="http://xmlns.oracle.com/ku" version="1.0"> <SCHEMA>%USER_NAME%</SCHEMA> <NAME>EBA_COUNTRIES_V</NAME> <DEFAULT_COLLATION>USING_NLS_COMP</DEFAULT_COLLATION> <COL_LIST> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>COUNTRY_ID</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>NAME</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>NATIONALITY</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>COUNTRY_CODE</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>CAPITAL</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>POPULATION</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>AREA</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>REGION</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>SUB_REGION</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>INTERMEDIATE_REGION</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>ORGNAIZATION_REGION</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> </COL_LIST> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> <SUBQUERY>select c.country_id, c.name, c.nationality, c.country_code, c.capital, c.population, c.area_km2 area, r.name region, s.name sub_region, i.name intermediate_region, o.name orgnaization_region from eba_countries c , eba_country_regions r , eba_country_sub_regions s , eba_country_intermediates i , eba_country_organizations o where c.region_id = r.id (+) and c.sub_region_id = s.id (+) and c.intermediate_region_id = i.id (+) and c.organization_region_id = o.id</SUBQUERY> </VIEW>
